description: Displays detailed metrics of a single node in the server.

panels.description: The average percentage of non-idle time for all CPU cores in the last 15s
panels.title: Utilization

The amount of data entering a specified network or system
panels.title: Traffic In

panels.description: The amount of data being received over the network interface named "eth0"
Provides real-time data of the CPU's current operating frequency
panels.title: Frequency

panels.description: The amount of data that leaves a specified network or system

panels.description: The amount of data being sent out through the "eth0" network interface
The percentage of efficiency and load at which each physical core in the CPU completes a work task in a given time
panels.title: Physical Cores Utilization

panels.description: The percentage of the ability and efficiency of each logical core in the CPU to process a task at a given time
panels.title: Logical Cores Utilization

panels.description: Disk capacity usage over a period of time
panels.title: Capacity Over Time

panels.description: How many read and write operations can be performed per second on the disk
panels.title: IOPS

panels.description: The amount of RAM(random access memory) in use
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.title: Usage Over Time

panels.description: Measures the speed of data read and write operations completed in 5min
